content:
Organize your kitchen to have all the necessary tools at hand for the speedy preparation of meals. Use your microwave to reheat leftovers, defrost, and at times to cook a whole dinner. A slow cooker can be the ultimate hack despite the name. You can toss in whatever you want to prepare, and come back at the end of the day to a delicious hot meal.  

Cleaning up is simple: rinse the pot and run it through the dishwasher. Always check for directions beforehand.

Make smoothies with your blender, chop food with your food processor, and a toaster oven to swiftly warm anything. 

Another hack is to cook in bulk and store all leftovers in the freezer. With lasagna, for instance, slice the leftovers and freeze for a feast at a later date. The same applies to soups. You can make a vat of minestrone and freeze in single-serve containers that can be reheated individually before consumption.
